snippet.title: Revenge of the Savage Planet - Official Trailer | ID@Xbox
snippet.description:
Kindred Labs is here to showcase the tools you can create from the proper resources in this fun new Revenge of the Savage Planet trailer for the upcoming upbeat, satirical action adventure sci-fi game. Check out the spotlight on the Goo Cannon, the lasso and whip, the Conductive Goo, the Goo Fuse, the Mag Fork, and the Griffin Splunker Pacifier pistol weapons and tools to see them in action. 

Revenge of the Savage Planet will be available on May 8, 2025 on Xbox Series X/S and Game Pass. It is also coming to PS5, PS4, and PC (GOG, Epic Games Store, and Steam).

#IGN #Gaming
